name: Hack (and Slash) The Planets
description:
Help Flumpo hack and slash those planets! Click and drag your mouse to slice through planets, and hold A, S, D, or F to highlight an area to slice through! Planets can only be destroyed if you slice through them while the current area is highlighted, so be quick! The closer the planet is to the Optimal Mark when you slice through it, the more points you get.

Note: the music used in the game consists of the tracks "Loyalty" and "Horology" by King Gizzard and the Lizard Wizard from their 2017 album Polygondwanaland. The band released this album with an open source license.
